name: Production Panic
description:
In Production Panic you are a maintenance robot managing a production line. You must make sure packages are painted, nailed shut, and stamped before putting them into a shipping truck. However, the machines used for these operations keep malfunctioning. Soon the line gets out of control as you try to fix machines and load the truck to stay on quota and keep your approval rating up.  

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Move

Z: Pick up packages/Put down packages/Repair machines

X: Charge fire extinguisher

Shift (Hold): Run
